HEBREW: שלש אמות אמ"ש סוד גדול מופלא ומכוסה וחתום בשש טבעות וממנו יוצאים אש ומים מתחלקים זכר ונקבה: שלש אמות אמ"ש יסודן ומהן נולדו אבות שמהם נברא הכל:
ENGLISH: The three mothers - Aleph, Mem, Shin - a mighty mystery, most occult and most marvelous, sealed as with six rings, and from them proceed Fire, Water, [and Air]; these are subsequently differentiated into male and female. Three mothers - Aleph, Mem, Shin, their foundation. And from them were born fathers and all was created from them.
